author: Staff Reporter
text:
Governor K Rosaiah has condoled the death of veteran Congress leader and former Lok Sabha speaker Balram Jakhar, who passed away in Delhi on Wednesday. In his condolence message to his son Sunil Jakhar, he said that the nation has lost a renowned statesman, who was known for his humaneness and simplicity.

A multifaceted personality

“He was a multifaceted personality, an eminent parliamentarian who was instrumental in modernisation of parliamentary works and promotion of parliamentary library,” said the Governor.
title: Governor condoles Balram Jakhar’s death
